title: The Power of the Brain - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/29/19
itunes:title: The Power of the Brain - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/29/19
description:
George Noory and researcher Neil Slade explore his work into the human brain, how personality is created, and how laughter and music can improve mental performance.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
